properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ho avy indray Jeso Mpanjaka,
Ho avy handray ny olony.
Ho avy Izy izao hanjaka,
Fiainana no atolony.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Haleloia, Hosana.
Haleloia, Hosana.
Avia, tsenao,
Indro tamy 'Lay Tompo tia,
Mpanjaka Tsitoha.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ho avy indray Jeso Mpitsara,
Amin'izay ho hitany
Ireo izay nanao ny tsara,
Izay nanao ny sitrany.
Haleloia, Hosana, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ho avy izao he tsy ho ela
O ! mba lazao ny hevitrao
Hiakatra sa dia havela ?
Mpanota ô ! lazao, ô lazao !
Haleloia, Hosana sns
